verses.verse: Now <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> was a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%>, and he was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of an <S%H802%H2181>harlot<s%>: and <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>.

And <S%H1568>Gilead's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H1121>sons<s%>; and his <S%H802>wife's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> grew <S%H1431>up<s%>, and they thrust <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thou shalt not <S%H5157>inherit<s%> in our <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>; for thou art the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H312>strange<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>.

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2897>Tob<s%>: and there were <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H7386>vain<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> with him.
¶ And it came to pass in process of <S%H3117>time<s%>, that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> made <S%H3898>war<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it was so, that when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> made <S%H3898>war<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2897>Tob<s%>:
And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and be our <S%H7101>captain<s%>, that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>.

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, Did not ye <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, and <S%H1644>expel<s%> me out of my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>? and why are ye <S%H935>come<s%> unto me now when ye are in <S%H6887>distress<s%>?

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>, Therefore we turn <S%H7725>again<s%> to thee now, that thou mayest <S%H1980>go<s%> with us, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and be our <S%H7218>head<s%> over all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, If ye bring me home <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> me, shall I be your <S%H7218>head<s%>?

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H8085>witness<s%> between us, if we <S%H6213>do<s%> not so according to thy <S%H1697>words<s%>.

Then <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> him <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H7101>captain<s%> over them: and <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H1696>uttered<s%> all his <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What hast thou to do with me, that thou art <S%H935>come<s%> against me to <S%H3898>fight<s%> in my <S%H776>land<s%>?

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> unto the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>, Because <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H776>land<s%>, when they came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from <S%H769>Arnon<s%> even unto <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>, and unto <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: now therefore restore those lands <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%>.
And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>:

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took not <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, nor the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>:

But when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H3212>walked<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> unto the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>;

Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let me, I pray thee, pass <S%H5674>through<s%> thy <S%H776>land<s%>: but the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> would not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> thereto. And in like manner they <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: but he <S%H14>would<s%> not consent: and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>.

Then they went <S%H3212>along<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> by the east <S%H4217%H8121>side<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, but <S%H935>came<s%> not within the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: for <S%H769>Arnon<s%> was the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Let us <S%H5674>pass<s%>, we pray thee, through thy <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5704>into<s%> my <S%H4725>place<s%>.

But <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H539>trusted<s%> not <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through his <S%H1366>coast<s%>: but <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> all his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H622>together<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and all his <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them: so <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3423>possessed<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of that <S%H776>country<s%>.

And they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> all the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, from <S%H769>Arnon<s%> even unto <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>, and from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> even unto <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

So now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and shouldest thou <S%H3423>possess<s%> it?

Wilt not thou <S%H3423>possess<s%> that which <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> thy <S%H430>god<s%> giveth thee to <S%H3423>possess<s%>? So whomsoever the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall drive <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> us, them will we <S%H3423>possess<s%>.

And now art thou any thing <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>? did he <S%H7378>ever<s%> <S%H7378>strive<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, or did he <S%H3898>ever<s%> <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them,

While <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and in <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and in all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that be along by the <S%H3027>coasts<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>? why therefore did ye not <S%H5337>recover<s%> them within that <S%H6256>time<s%>?

Wherefore I have not <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee, but thou <S%H6213%H853>doest<s%> me <S%H7451>wrong<s%> to <S%H3898>war<s%> against me: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H8199>Judge<s%> be <S%H8199>judge<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> between the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>.
Howbeit the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> which he <S%H7971>sent<s%> him.

¶ Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came upon <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%>, and he passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and from <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> he passed <S%H5674>over<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>.

And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, If thou shalt without <S%H5414>fail<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> into mine <S%H3027>hands<s%>,

Then it shall be, that <S%H3318>whatsoever<s%> cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> of the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> me, when I <S%H7725>return<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, shall surely be the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%>, and I will offer it <S%H5927>up<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>.

¶ So <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into his <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> them from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, even till thou <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H4511>Minnith<s%>, even <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and unto the <S%H58>plain<s%> of the <S%H3754%H64>vineyards<s%>, with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>. Thus the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> were <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and, behold, his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him with <S%H8596>timbrels<s%> and with <S%H4246>dances<s%>: and she was his only <S%H3173>child<s%>; beside her he had neither <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H176>nor<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>.

And it came to pass, when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H162>Alas<s%>, my <S%H1323>daughter<s%>! thou hast <S%H3766>brought<s%> me <S%H3766>very<s%> <S%H3766>low<s%>, and thou art one of them that <S%H5916>trouble<s%> me: for I have <S%H6475>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> go <S%H7725>back<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, My <S%H1>father<s%>, if thou hast <S%H6475>opened<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H6213>do<s%> to me according to that <S%H834>which<s%> hath <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> out of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; <S%H310>forasmuch<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>taken<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> for thee of thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, even of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto her <S%H1>father<s%>, Let this <S%H1697>thing<s%> be <S%H6213>done<s%> for me: let me <S%H7503>alone<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>, that I may go <S%H3212>up<s%> and <S%H3381>down<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H1058>bewail<s%> my <S%H1331>virginity<s%>, I and my <S%H7464%H7474>fellows<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>. And he sent her <S%H7971>away<s%> for <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>: and she <S%H3212>went<s%> with her <S%H7464>companions<s%>, and <S%H1058>bewailed<s%> her <S%H1331>virginity<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>, that she <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto her <S%H1>father<s%>, who <S%H6213>did<s%> with her according to his <S%H5088>vow<s%> which he had <S%H5087>vowed<s%>: and she <S%H3045>knew<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%>. And it was a <S%H2706>custom<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

That the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H3117%H3117>yearly<s%> to <S%H8567>lament<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3316>Jephthah<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%>.
